results.title: Effects of nisoldipine and lisinopril on microvascular dysfunction in hypertensive Type I diabetes patients with nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Effects of @CHEMICAL_Nisoldipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015737 @@@nisoldipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Microvascular_Angina</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017566 @@@microvascular dysfunction@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@Type I diabetes@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@.
